item.title: Diffusion in Dynamic Networks with Continuous Inputs to Allocate Responsibility
item.description: We investigate how responsibility for any negative effect spreads in a dynamic network. Not just responsibility for carbon emissions, but also for example systemic risk.

item.title: Network-based allocation of responsibility for GHG emissions
item.description: In this paper we allocate responsibilities for GHG emissions in a network.

item.title: Strategic environmental responsibility in networks
item.description: [Work in progress] We evaluate the effect of changing the underlying network structure on the responsibility allocation, and we investigate how we can use this to achieve the emisison reduction goals of the Paris Agreement.
